url.description: The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.
The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.

maxwidth.description: The maximum width of the embed frame in pixels.

maxheight.description: The maximum height of the embed frame in pixels.

discover.description: Whether to perform an oEmbed discovery request for unsanctioned providers.

key.description: A 12-character Akismet API key. Available at akismet.com/get/

akismet_strictness.description: If true, Akismet will automatically discard the worst spam automatically rather than putting it in the spam folder.

akismet_show_user_comments_approved.description: If true, show the number of approved comments beside each comment author in the comments list page.

interval.description: The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all
The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all

key.description: A 12-character Akismet API key. Available at akismet.com/get/
A 12-character Akismet API key. Available at akismet.com/get/

import_id.description: The import unique ID as provided by Event Aggregator service

batch_hash.description: The hash of the next expected batch, as previously provided by the client

status.description: The current status of the import.

interval.description: The current interval, in seconds, between the end of a batch process and the start of the next; as set on the server.

import_id.description: The import unique ID as provided by Event Aggregator service

batch_hash.description: The hash of the next expected batch, as previously provided by the client

status.description: The new status of the import.

message.description: The new status message for the user, not localized.

message_slug.description: The new status message slug, to allow for localized messages.

per_page.description: The number of events to return on each page

start_date.description: Events should start after the specified date

end_date.description: Events should start before the specified date

search.description: Events should contain the specified string in the title or description

categories.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified categories slugs or IDs

tags.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified tags slugs or IDs

venue.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified venue IDs

organizer.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified organizer IDs

featured.description: Events should be filtered by their featured status

status.description: The event post status

geoloc.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by whether their venue has geolocation data

geoloc_lat.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue latitude location, must also provide geoloc_lng

geoloc_lng.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue longitude location, must also provide geoloc_lat

include.description: Include events with one of the post IDs specified in the array of CSV list, date filters will be ignored.

post_parent.description: Events should be filtered by their post_parent being the specified one.

all_day.description: Whether the event lasts the whole day or not

image.description: The event featured image ID or URL

show_map.description: Whether the event should show a map or not

show_map_link.description: Whether the event should show a map link or not

hide_from_listings.description: Whether events should be hidden in the calendar view or not

sticky.description: Whether the event should be sticky in the calendar view or not

featured.description: Whether the event should be featured on the site or not

only_regenerate_missing_thumbnails.description: Whether to only regenerate missing thumbnails. It's faster with this enabled.

delete_unregistered_thumbnail_files.description: Whether to delete any old, now unregistered thumbnail files.

update_usages_in_posts.description: Whether to update the image tags in any posts that make use of this attachment.

update_usages_in_posts_post_type.description: The types of posts to update. Defaults to all public post types.

update_usages_in_posts_post_ids.description: Specific post IDs to update rather than any posts that use this attachment.

update_usages_in_posts_posts_per_loop.description: Posts to process per loop. This is to control memory usage and you likely don't need to adjust this.

src.description: URL to the edited image file.

angle.description: Angle to rotate clockwise in degrees.

left.description: Horizontal position from the left to begin the crop as a percentage of the image width.

top.description: Vertical position from the top to begin the crop as a percentage of the image height.

width.description: Width of the crop as a percentage of the image width.

height.description: Height of the crop as a percentage of the image height.

rotation.description: The amount to rotate the image clockwise in degrees. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

x.description: As a percentage of the image, the x position to start the crop from. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

y.description: As a percentage of the image, the y position to start the crop from. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

width.description: As a percentage of the image, the width to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

height.description: As a percentage of the image, the height to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the comment.

email.description: This address is used for admin purposes, like new user notification.

timezone.description: A city in the same timezone as you.

time_format.description: A time format for all time strings.

start_of_week.description: A day number of the week that the week should start on.

use_smilies.description: Convert emoticons like :-) and :-P to graphics on display.

default_ping_status.description: Allow link notifications from other blogs (pingbacks and trackbacks) on new articles.

default_comment_status.description: Allow people to submit comments on new posts.
